A

aboutButton - Variable in class djf.ui.AppGUI
 
activateWorkspace(BorderPane) - Method in class djf.components.AppWorkspaceComponent
When called this function puts the workspace into the window, revealing the controls for editing work.
APP_PROPERTIES_FILE_NAME - Static variable in class djf.settings.AppStartupConstants
 
APP_PROPERTIES_FILE_NAME2 - Static variable in class djf.settings.AppStartupConstants
 
AppDataComponent - Interface in djf.components
This interface provides the structure for data components in our applications.
AppFileComponent - Interface in djf.components
This interface provides the structure for file components in our applications.
AppFileController - Class in djf.controller
This class provides the event programmed responses for the file controls that are provided by this framework.
AppFileController(AppTemplate) - Constructor for class djf.controller.AppFileController
This constructor just keeps the app for later.
AppGUI - Class in djf.ui
This class provides the basic user interface for this application, including all the file controls, but not including the workspace, which would be customly provided for each app.
AppGUI(Stage, String, AppTemplate) - Constructor for class djf.ui.AppGUI
This constructor initializes the file toolbar for use.
AppMessageDialogSingleton - Class in djf.ui
This class serves to present custom text messages to the user when events occur.
appPane - Variable in class djf.ui.AppGUI
 
AppPropertyType - Enum in djf.settings
This enum provides properties that are to be loaded via XML files to be used for setting up the application.
AppStartupConstants - Class in djf.settings
This class provides a set of constants useful for setting up the app.
AppStartupConstants() - Constructor for class djf.settings.AppStartupConstants
 
AppStyleComponent - Class in djf.components
This interface serves as a family of type that will initialize the style for some set of controls, like the workspace, for example.
AppStyleComponent() - Constructor for class djf.components.AppStyleComponent
 
AppTemplate - Class in djf
This is the framework's JavaFX application.
AppTemplate() - Constructor for class djf.AppTemplate
 
appTitle - Variable in class djf.ui.AppGUI
 
AppWorkspaceComponent - Class in djf.components
This abstract class provides the structure for workspace components in our applications.
AppWorkspaceComponent() - Constructor for class djf.components.AppWorkspaceComponent
 
AppYesNoCancelDialogSingleton - Class in djf.ui
This class serves to present a dialog with three options to the user: Yes, No, or Cancel and lets one access which was selected.
